message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire something valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000.
I appreciate the offer, Alice. However, $15,000 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend.  I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $10,000 at this time.
I understand that $15,000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $13,500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go.

Alice, I appreciate you being willing to meet me halfway, but $13,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,500, which is a fair compromise given the value you're seeking.  Let me know what you think.
I can see that we're close, but I'm still not willing to go below $13,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and meet you at $13,000. This is the best I can do.
